faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is a single or multi-family office in Dubai?
items.answer: A single family office caters to the needs of a single family, whereas a multi-family office serves multiple families, offering cost-saving benefits.

items.question: Should I set up my family office in the UAE?
items.answer: Setting up your family office in the UAE empowers you with a tax-friendly and politically stable landscape and access to a network of legal services and top-tier banks.

items.question: How long does it take to set up a family office in the UAE?
items.answer: Our experts help you launch your family office within 1-10 days, depending on your location, document readiness, and unique family structuring needs.

items.question: What is the structure of a UAE-based family office?
items.answer: A single family office structure involves a core team that oversees trusts, estates, investments, and lifestyle management to build and preserve your wealth.

items.question: Is there a minimum capital requirement for setting up a UAE family office?
items.answer: Yes, you’ll need a minimum of AED 500,000 in liquid assets to secure a SFO license.
